snippet: My front hall has no closet. What’s the best way to create space for coats and shoes, so that it’s not seen as a problem by potential buyers?
abstract: Market Ready Q & A offers homeowners advice on how to create space for coats and shoes before putting home on the market.
lead_paragraph: My front hall has no closet. What’s the best way to create space for coats and shoes, so that it’s not seen as a problem by potential buyers?

headline.seo: Storing Coats and Shoes When Your Front Hall Has No Closet
